project_abstract.cdata: The Second Oil Palm Processing Project will assist in financing a project consisting of the following: a) the establishment of 8,000 ha of industrial coconut plantations, 4,500 ha of outgrowers' holdings planted in coconuts and 4,500 ha of outgrowers' holdings planted in oil palm; b) roads and other infrastructure for existing and planned coconut plantations; and c) construction of a palm oil mill at Dabou with the capacity to process the produce of some 13,000 ha of oil palm.
